headline: C.H. Robinson Urges Supreme Court to Affirm Uniform Federal Freight Laws
summary: EDEN PRAIRIE, Minn., January 14, 2026--C.H. Robinson, the leader in Lean AI supply chains, today filed its merits brief in Montgomery v. Caribe Transport II, LLC, a U.S. Supreme Court case that will determine whether freight brokers may be held liable under varying state laws for accidents involving federally licensed motor carriers. As one of the world’s largest logistics platforms—trusted by 83,000 customers and 450,000 contract carriers to move 37 million annual shipments—C.H. Robinson depend
